alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:46PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Sullivan, northeastern Cheshire, northwestern Hillsborough and central Merrimack Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 746 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Warner to near Bradford to near Marlow. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Concord, Franklin, Henniker, Hopkinton, Loudon, Charlestown, Antrim, Canterbury, Bradford, Bennington, Nelson, Windsor, Deering, Warner, Hillsborough, Alstead, Marlow, Stoddard, Sullivan and Weare. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 3 and 29. Interstate 93 between mile markers 39 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
